name: year_fractions
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool date_calculator.
Tool description: This API helps to perform some computations on dates: accrual factors, maturity dates, contract dates,  and other due dates, datetime delta, time zones conversion, recurring dates, and much more. 
API description: Calculates the year fraction between two dates based on the specified day count convention using the RapidAPI service.

start_date.description: The start date of the period time in YYYY-MM-DD format

end_date.description: The end date of the period time in YYYY-MM-DD format

dcc_types.description: The day count convention to be used for the calculation (e.g., '30/360', 'ACT/360', etc.).
